title: 51 Gifts Your Best Friend Actually Wants
description: Curated by best friends, for best friends.
excerpt: Don't know what to get your ultimate partner in crime? Try our best friend gift guide for unexpected ideas. Shop top best friend gifts for holidays, birthdays, and more.
text: Stylish Shoes Dr. Martens Zebzag Suede Slingback Platform MuleIt’s no secret that associate fashion commerce editor Meg Donohue swears by her Docs, and we’re obsessed with this slip-on clog. Plus, these are unisex, so you can gift them to any BFF. Mansur Gavriel BonBon BagMansur Gavriel’s new mini bag comes in a whole range of colors that she’ll adore. Choose from eye-catching hues (like this sky blue option), neutral shades, or shiny metallics.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTwo-In-One HeadscarfJanessa Leone Benji HeadscarfSince it essentially doubles as a hat, she’ll have one less accessory to worry about with this cozy hooded headscarf from Janessa Leone (it’s a favorite of senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong). The alpaca blend will keep her nice and toasty on chillier days.Lounge ChairsSolo Stove 1903 Adirondack Modern ChairSharing time with your friends is the best gift of all. Gift these Adirondack chairs with a modern flair and make more memories together.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDelicious DessertsMilk Bar The Milk Bar SamplerDoes your friend have a sweet tooth? Order her this delectable assortment of cookies and truffles from Milk Bar. It even includes a slice of the bakery’s signature pie, for good measure.Fresh KicksVeja Campo SneakersPerhaps you noticed your best friend’s favorite crisp white sneakers are becoming...not so crisp. So, out with the old, and in with a fresh pair of everyday sneakers.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCute Key FobTory Burch Tory Burch Corgi Key FobThe dog lover won’t be able to add Tory Burch’s corgi-shaped leather fob to her keys—or employ it as a bag charm—fast enough.Instagrammable BakewareHoly Sheet & Big ChillSheet pans and cooling racks are one of those kitchen items you never think to replace. Whether she’s a baker or not, this set will upgrade any home. It can withstand extreme temperatures, is designed for easy cleanup, and has nontoxic, nonstick technology. Plus, the aesthetic is perfect for capturing content.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSuitcase OrganizationBAGGU Packing Cube SetFor that one friend who always needs your help packing.Alarm ClockHatch Hatch Restore 2If you owe her in any way, gift her a Hatch clock. She’ll love you big time. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMassage Gift Card Spa Finder Gift CardLet’s be real, all anyone wants is a good trip to the spa. Portable Steamer Nesugar SteamerRespectfully, wrinkles aren’t cute. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPassport CaseRoyce New York RFID Blocking Leather Passport HolderOh, would you look at that; time to plan a girls’ trip. Tumbler PouchDabria Water Bottle Carrier Bag with Phone Pocket If she already has the Stanley, this will only make her all the more attached to it. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPaddle Racket Sunnylife Pickleball Set Is she going to convince you to play with her? Hell no, but you can gift her a super cute racket set to make up for not being her partner. Super Soft White + Warren Cashmere Travel Wrap Scarf Everyone who tries this White and Warren travel wrap raves about it (including our senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong). Chances are she will, too. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowExercise ShortsLululemon Hotty Hot High-Rise Lined Short Your sporty friend will go gaga over these. Arts & Crafts The Woobles Strawberry Crochet KitFor the DIY crafty friend, The Woobles offer addictive yet beginner-friendly crochet kits. You can even get specific characters like the Powerpuff Girls or Harry Potter. html:
Stylish Shoes

Dr. Martens Zebzag Suede Slingback Platform Mule

It’s no secret that associate fashion commerce editor Meg Donohue swears by her Docs, and we’re obsessed with this slip-on clog. Plus, these are unisex, so you can gift them to any BFF.

Mansur Gavriel BonBon Bag

Mansur Gavriel’s new mini bag comes in a whole range of colors that she’ll adore. Choose from eye-catching hues (like this sky blue option), neutral shades, or shiny metallics.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Two-In-One Headscarf

Janessa Leone Benji Headscarf

Since it essentially doubles as a hat, she’ll have one less accessory to worry about with this cozy hooded headscarf from Janessa Leone (it’s a favorite of senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong). The alpaca blend will keep her nice and toasty on chillier days.

Lounge Chairs

Solo Stove 1903 Adirondack Modern Chair

Sharing time with your friends is the best gift of all. Gift these Adirondack chairs with a modern flair and make more memories together.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Delicious Desserts

Milk Bar The Milk Bar Sampler

Does your friend have a sweet tooth? Order her this delectable assortment of cookies and truffles from Milk Bar. It even includes a slice of the bakery’s signature pie, for good measure.

Fresh Kicks

Veja Campo Sneakers

Perhaps you noticed your best friend’s favorite crisp white sneakers are becoming...not so crisp. So, out with the old, and in with a fresh pair of everyday sneakers.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Cute Key Fob

Tory Burch Tory Burch Corgi Key Fob

The dog lover won’t be able to add Tory Burch’s corgi-shaped leather fob to her keys—or employ it as a bag charm—fast enough.

Instagrammable Bakeware

Holy Sheet & Big Chill

Sheet pans and cooling racks are one of those kitchen items you never think to replace. Whether she’s a baker or not, this set will upgrade any home. It can withstand extreme temperatures, is designed for easy cleanup, and has nontoxic, nonstick technology. Plus, the aesthetic is perfect for capturing content.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Suitcase Organization

BAGGU Packing Cube Set

For that one friend who always needs your help packing.

Alarm Clock

Hatch Hatch Restore 2

If you owe her in any way, gift her a Hatch clock. She’ll love you big time.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Massage Gift Card

Spa Finder Gift Card

Let’s be real, all anyone wants is a good trip to the spa.

Portable Steamer

Nesugar Steamer

Respectfully, wrinkles aren’t cute.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Passport Case

Royce New York RFID Blocking Leather Passport Holder

Oh, would you look at that; time to plan a girls’ trip.

Tumbler Pouch

Dabria Water Bottle Carrier Bag with Phone Pocket

If she already has the Stanley, this will only make her all the more attached to it.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Paddle Racket

Sunnylife Pickleball Set

Is she going to convince you to play with her? Hell no, but you can gift her a super cute racket set to make up for not being her partner.

Super Soft

White + Warren Cashmere Travel Wrap Scarf

Everyone who tries this White and Warren travel wrap raves about it (including our senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong). Chances are she will, too.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Exercise Shorts

Lululemon Hotty Hot High-Rise Lined Short

Your sporty friend will go gaga over these.

Arts & Crafts

The Woobles Strawberry Crochet Kit

For the DIY crafty friend, The Woobles offer addictive yet beginner-friendly crochet kits. You can even get specific characters like the Powerpuff Girls or Harry Potter.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Vinyl Subscription

Vinyl Me, Please Vinyl Record Subscription

All the cool girls collect vinyl records, and this subscription service will deliver her a new one each month.

Designer Splurge

Gucci GG Marmont Bi-Color Card Case Wallet

To really spoil her as she deserves, a Gucci wallet like this one is timeless and practical.
